craterdog.smart

Class SmartObjectMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.core.TreeCodec
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.core.ObjectCodec
        • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper
          • craterdog.smart.SmartObjectMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core.Versioned, Serializable

    public class SmartObjectMapper
extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper
    This object mapper handles the conversion of a smart object to and from a JSON string. The mapper can be configured to censor sensitive attributes that are marked with the @Sensitive annotation.
    Author:
    Jeff Webb, Mukesh Jyothi, Derk Norton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
